code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import dayjs from"dayjs";var columns=[{name:"Name",sortable:true,selector:"name",cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-tag":"allowRowEvents",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"cultures/edit/".concat(row._id)},children:row.name})});}},{name:"Country Source",selector:"countrySource",sortable:true},{name:"Report Date",selector:"reportDate",sortable:true,cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-tag":"allowRowEvents",children:dayjs(row.reportDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")});}}];export default columns;
